H0.text: Wheel and axle is the best tool for workers to lower a piano from a window when the piano is too wide to fit through the door, as they move it from the second floor of a building.

H1.text: An inclined plane is the best tool to help the workers lower the piano from the window so they can move it from the second floor to the ground.

H2.text: Pulley is the best tool to help workers lower a piano from the window when moving it from the second floor of a building because the piano is too wide to fit through the door.

H3.text: A wedge is the best tool to help the workers lower a piano from a window when moving it from the second floor of a building, because the piano is too wide to fit through the door.

A4.text: Gears and pulleys demonstrate mechanical advantage.
